romaji: Furu ike ya / kawazu tobikomu / mizu no oto
english: An old pond; a frog jumps in; the sound of water.
notes: A foundational haiku focused on stillness and sudden movement.

romaji: Natsukusa ya / tsuwamono domo ga / yume no ato
english: Summer grasses; all that remains of warriors' dreams.
notes: Reflects impermanence through a historical battlefield image.

romaji: Kaki kueba / kane ga naru nari / Horyuji
english: Biting a persimmon, the bell tolls at Horyu-ji.
notes: A modern-classic haiku blending everyday life with temple atmosphere.

romaji: Meigetsu o / totte kurero to / naku ko kana
english: A child cries, asking me to fetch the harvest moon.
notes: Captures innocent longing through a domestic scene.

romaji: Shibaraku wa / hana no ue naru / tsukiyo kana
english: For a while, moonlight rests above the blossoms.
notes: A quiet scene balancing moonlight and cherry blossoms.

romaji: Samidare o / atsume te hayashi / Mogamigawa
english: Gathering summer rains, the Mogami River rushes on.
notes: A dynamic river image with strong seasonal presence.

romaji: Suzume no ko / soko noke soko noke / ouma ga toru
english: Little sparrows, move aside, the horse is coming through.
notes: Playful and warm, characteristic of Issa's tone.

romaji: Asagao ni / tsurube torarete / morai mizu
english: Morning glories took my well-bucket; I asked next door for water.
notes: Famous for gentle empathy toward nature.

romaji: Yuku haru ya / tori naki uo no / me wa namida
english: Spring departs; birds cry, and fish eyes seem tearful.
notes: A classic expression of seasonal transition and sadness.

romaji: Yasegaeru / makeru na Issa / kore ni ari
english: Skinny frog, don't give up! Issa is here with you.
notes: Humorous encouragement and compassion in Issa's voice.

romaji: Aki fukaki / tonari wa nani o / suru hito zo
english: In deep autumn, what kind of person lives next door?

romaji: Haru no umi / hinemosu notari / notari kana
english: The spring sea stretches lazily all day, rising and falling.
notes: Known for musical phrasing and calm motion.
